context.description: Create a monitoring model for use by Business Monitor. This wizard exports monitoring information, and is the first stage in enabling Business Monitor to monitor IBM Integration events.

topic.label: Creating a monitoring model for use by Business Monitor
Configuring monitoring event sources using monitoring properties

context.description: Select the message flows that you want to include in the model. Only flows that can be deployed are shown here.

topic.label: Configuring monitoring event sources using monitoring properties

context.description: Enter a file name for the monitoring information that you are exporting. You must specify an existing directory; the wizard does not create directories.

topic.label: Configuring monitoring event sources using monitoring properties
